thread.title: Bellator 170 live blog: Tito Ortiz vs. Chael Sonnen
thread.title_full: Bellator 170 live blog: Tito Ortiz vs. Chael Sonnen

author: Chuck Mindenhall
title: Bellator 170 live blog: Tito Ortiz vs. Chael Sonnen
text:
Tito Ortiz and Chael Sonnen will clash in the Bellator 170 main event Saturday night. Esther Lin, MMA Fighting 
This is the Bellator 170 live blog for Tito Ortiz vs. Chael Sonnen , a light heavyweight bout at Saturday night's Bellator event   Calif.Ortiz, who has won two of his past five fights, will face Sonnen, who is making his Bellator debut, in the main event.Check out the Bellator 170 live blog below. Round 1: Referee for Tito's final fight is John McCarthy. Tito heard the instructions with his fists ready to fly. No touch of gloves. And we're off. They trade up top, and now Ortiz gets a single-leg, takes down Sonnen. Sonnen quickly sweeps, and now he goes to work. Looking for a D'Arce, now transitions to his side. He has a nice head lock on Ortiz, who is turning shades or red. The guillotine is pretty tight, but Ortiz pops out and now he's on top. Once again in the scramble Chael tries to buck, but now Tito has full mount. Wow. And he's raining elbows. He has Sonnen's back, and he's trying to choke him out. Sonnen turning red now. There's the tap. Wow. Ortiz taps out Sonnen! And he's digging the grave, and takes a bow. That's one hell of a way to go out. 
Bellator 170 official results: Tito Ortiz submits Chael Sonnen (rear-naked choke) at 2:03 of R1
